contentrichtext.text: {{unref|date=December 2012}} {{about||the artist the company is named after|Kenny Howard|}} {{Infobox company | name = Von Dutch LLC | logo = [[Image:Von Dutchlogo.png|150px|Von Dutch logo]] | caption = | type = | genre = | fate = | predecessor = | successor = | foundation = 1999 | founder = | defunct = | location_city = [[Los Angeles, California]] | location_country = [[United States|U.S.]] | location = | locations = | area_served = Thailand, Brazil, Philippines, Italy | key_people = | industry = Men’s and women’s apparel and accessories | products = Shirts, shorts, pants, jackets, shoes, hats, jeans, bags, eyewear, watches, and belts/buckles | services = | revenue = | operating_income = | net_income = | aum = | assets = | equity = | owner = Royer Brands International S.a.r.l., Luxembourg | num_employees = | parent = Groupe Royer S.A., France | divisions = | subsid = | homepage = www.vondutch.com | footnotes = | intl = }} '''Von Dutch''' is an American multinational licensing company named after [[Kenny Howard]], an artist and pinstriper of the [[Kustom Kulture]] movement. After Howard's death in 1992, his daughters sold the Von Dutch name to Michael Cassel and [[Robert "Bobby" Vaughn|Robert Vaughn]].{{Citation needed|date=April 2011}} The clothing brand gained popularity in the US and attracted the attention of celebrities such as Madonna, Britney Spears, Justin Timberlake, and later Ashton Kutcher. The French stylist [[Christian Audigier]] helped popularize the brand, and left it in 2004. The company was purchased in 2009 by [[Groupe Royer]] S.A., through its Luxembourg subsidiary Royer Brands International S.a.r.l. Groupe Royer is the largest shoe distributor in Europe and does distribution for brands such as Converse, New Balance, and Charles Jourdan. The Von Dutch brand has licensees in Brazil, the Philippines, Thailand, Hong Kong, Macau, China, and Italy. The brand is headquartered in Los Angeles. The head Chief Executive Officer is Terry Hauss, the Brand Director is Olivier Mercier, and the Brand Assurance Manager is Pardeese Ehya. == See also == *[[Designer clothing]] *[[Tonny Sorensen]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *{{official|http://www.vondutch.com}} {{Use dmy dates|date=January 2011}} [[Category:Clothing companies of the United States]] [[Category:Companies based in Los Angeles, California]] [[Category:Companies established in 1999]] [[Category:Privately held companies based in California]] [[Category:2000s fashion]] [[Category:2010s fashion]]
